title: 'rustc' panicked at 'assertion failed: `(left == right)` (left: `collections::string::String`, right: `Box<Int>`)', ../src/librustc_borrowck/borrowck/mod.rs:453

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
Code to reproduce here: https://github.com/toffaletti/borrow-crash

`rustc 1.2.0 (082e47636 2015-08-03)`
